content.text:
# Ministry of Presidential Affairs

The Ministry of Presidential Affairs (Arabic: وزارة شؤون رئاسة الجمهورية) was a department of the Syrian Government. The ministry assisted the work of the President of Syria. The ministry was abolished on 13 December 2023.
List of ministers
* Mansour Fadlallah Azzam (2011 – 13 December 2023)
References
